RelatedSentence: BANGKOK - Thailand 's acting prime minister was meeting senators on Monday to search for a way out of a protracted political crisis , as anti-government protesters step up pressure to remove him and install a new administration .

RelatedSentence: Thailand is stuck in political limbo following the dismissal of Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra and nine of her ministers on May 7 after a court found them guilty of abuse of power .
